docs.title: TrustMark Glossary
docs.text: All Term Acronym Metric  For any edits or additions to this TrustMark Glossary, please contact Pete Hitchen.

docs.title: TrustMark Glossary
docs.text:
This page is generated from the source glossary CSV via export_glossary.py. To refresh the content, export the latest spreadsheet to data/trustmark_glossary.csv and run:

python export_glossary.py
